author: Flatsiedatsie
description: Airplay audio streaming as well as screen mirroring
name: Airport

Audio.description: Airplay audio-only streaming. Enable this if you want to stream music.

Video.description: Airplay screen mirroring. Supports audio, but cannot be used to stream audio only.

Debugging.description: Debugging allows you to diagnose any issues with the add-on. If enabled it will result in a lot more debug data in the internal log (which can be found under settings -> developer -> view internal logs).
